extendedInfo.description: Enjoy the most life-like computer characters in a relaxing game of Championship Hearts and treat yourself to a much-deserved break. Soothing jewel tones, cheerful HD graphics, helpful hints, and charming characters help you enjoy a fun card game. You set the pace, choose your challenge level, and your favorite variation. Sneak a few hands of Hearts in throughout your day, or sit down and enjoy a full game.Don't take our word for it!  Reviews from our players:***** "A fun game with a great tutorial."***** "So much fun-Thanks, Dreamquest"***** "I play hearts every morning and find it very relaxing."***** "This is great! Now I can not only have fun, but I can become an expert player too."A step-up from a lonely game of Solitaire, Championship Hearts delivers a game with personality:+ Discover 9 amusing computer opponents to both challenge and entertain you+ Enjoy a sense of accomplishment as you (re)master Hearts card play+ Easily play using taps, drag and drop, or our innovative zoom-n-play+ Sharpen your skills with Questie, our adorable in-game DreamCoachâ¢ dragon+ Improve your game with our HINTS as you learn not just what to play, but why+ Enjoy unlimited UNDOs and REPLAY hands until you perfect your play+ Explore in-game options that allow you to cheat in numerous ways and play exciting variationsEnjoy unlimited free Hearts games with this interactive version of the classic card game Hearts. Playing cards is simple and an intuitive menu system will let you explore a variety of game options. Easy enough for your inner child and engaging enough for your adult side. You'll enjoy joining our Player's Club to unlock advanced options that keep you engaged once you've mastered the free version.Universal app features HD graphics for Xoom and other hi-res tablet devices and newer Android phones running Honeycomb or Ice Cream Sandwich (3.x) as well as support for older Android phones running Froyo 2.2 or Gingerbread 2.3.For even more challenge, you can optionally upgrade to Player's Club to get these benefits:  * Practice - Sharpen your skills with Auto Hint, Play Suggested, Repass, Replay  * No Ads - Streamline game and remove in-house and third-party banner ads  * Cheats - Indulge your dark side with View cards, Redeal, Custom Hand, Illegal Plays, Playout Game  * More Variations - 6 new Hearts game variations to learn and enjoy:     + Classic - Hold rotation for passing + Low Club lead     + Jacks - Bonus points for capturing Jack of Diamonds     + Team - Work with your partner for team scoring     + Spot - Value-based scoring vary with pips on card     + Gates - Bonus points for hitting exact score gates     + Reverse - It's all upside down!  * Masters Bots - Highest level of mastery (3 new characters - Chuckles, Sparky, Starla)  * Personalized Avatar - Put yourself into the game with camera or photo  * Custom Bot Creator - Create new, custom opponents.  Import photos and set styles  * Customization - 3 new custom table backgrounds and 3 new card decks to play with

reviews.title: Not bad, not as dry as some of the other games

reviews.title: Fun just like I used to play in college
reviews.comment: Colorful and fun.  Best support for variations I\'ve seen.  Have to pay a buck if you want the tougher bots.
reviews.author: Christopher Williamson

reviews.comment: I wish i can give this app no stars at all the tapping dont work or the drag
reviews.author: gus silver

reviews.title: Still my favorite
reviews.comment: Fun!!!  Runs great on my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ignore the 1st three One Star. This version works.
reviews.comment: This is hands down the best Hearts for tablet I\'ve seen, and I\'ve tried a bunch. The original Android release had some problems -- hence the early three bad reviews -- but the new version works like a charm.  Whenever I have the bucks, I spring for the paid version, because I\'m not too fond of ads. Since I\'ve used the PC version of this app for a decade, I immediately bought the upgrade package. I knew it would be worth it, and it is. So I don\'t know how \"spoiled\" the game is by the ads. That\'s just how it goes in the Android App world. Free means ads, \'cause there ain\'t no free lunch! (^_^)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'ve been waiting for this to arrive on the Android platform for some time. I loved the Symbian versipon and like this one, too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Free version terrible bots
reviews.comment: I have enjoyed the Dreamquest series of card games on PC for over a decade and they are excellent.    This Free version includes very limited features and the entry level Bots are horrible players which will ruin your game strategy if u play too long (or are just starting out).  Game worked fine on GS2, but the Free version is simply not worth playing.    I also found the cards difficult to DragNDrop (which i dont experience from other developers such as Aces).  Full version 15 day trial better sales pitch.
reviews.author: Bryan Craig
